name: Army Shooter Soldier Civil War
description:
new action-packed first person sniper shooter game. Ultrarealistic 3D graphics and addictive game play give you real shooting experience.
Before few hours your opponent army attack on your border with tank, armor vehicles and helicopters. Stop your enemies to cross the border.
It is a big attack on the hub root of your base line. Your commander and other leader have been fallen. Your army needs your help because you are a brave soldier.
You are promoted your job anti-terrorist squad to border army. You are a modern sniper and ready to play your role in dangerous attacks.
